name: Dance Simulator v.2.0
description:
v.2.0 is a Lazy Update Because it says 1.8 (I Forgot To Change That 0_0)

It Says ClydeDefOg502 Because That's What My Username Is Supposed to be But Some One Stole My Name! :(((

Arrows For Moves and Space 

T For Troll

P For Ball

L For Cheats

Hold Q for Low Lag Mode

Hold E For Reset 

0 For Die 

1 For Mute Additional Sounds

2 For Mute Music

3 For Mute Combo 

I Think...

Cheats:

Z and X to go Through Levels 

C and V To Change Hat

If There is Any Bugs Tell Me And Make Suggestions to Please!

It Cant Save Progress Yet :(((
